product_name: Darn Tough Light Hiker Quarter Socks - Women's
long_description: Darn Tough Light Hiker Quarter women's socks provide miles of comfort and durability-trail-tested on the Vermont Long Trail, these socks provide a high level of cushioned performance. Darn Tough uses a custom-count, shrink-treated merino wool that enhances comfort and durability for outdoor activities. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. High-density cushioning underfoot. Ribbing above the ankles ensures a snug fit. Reinforced heels and toes. Elastic support around the arch. Ring-toe construction hides seams and enhances comfort. Darn Tough recommends that you machine wash socks inside out in warm water on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Darn Tough Light Hiker Quarter women's socks provide miles of comfort and durability-trail-tested on the Vermont Long Trail, these socks provide a high level of cushioned performance.
